title: Apolinario
author: Apolinario
content: BC GAME IS A SCAM SITE.I OPENED A ACCOUNT ON THE SITE AND I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO ACCUMULATE MORE THAN A MILLIOM JB TOKEN ON BCGAME BUT WHEN I TRIED TO WITHDRAW THEM THEY REFUSED TO PAY ME.I RUM A BLUG SITE AND IF YOU REFUSE TO PAY ME MY JB TOKEN I WILL WRITE SCAM AGAINST YOU AND DAMAGE YOUR REPUTATION.STAY AWAY FROM THE SITE THEY ARE SCAMMERS

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, as I can see you are new here. How about making your scam accusations detailed by providing solid proof of your winnings and suspended withdrawal. And then moving this thread to the scam  accusations board   Using the format: QuoteWhat happened::  Scammers Profile Link: Reference Link: Amount Scammed: Payment Method: Proof of Payment: PM/Chat Logs: Additional Notes:

comments.author: Tommyknockers
comments.body: Just because you wrote the information in capslock doesn't make your problem any more tragic or needing attention. Please adhere to the established format.

comments.author: Pokapoka124
comments.body: Quote from: Apolinario on August 09, 2023, 10:33:36 PMBC GAME IS A SCAM SITE.I OPENED A ACCOUNT ON THE SITE AND I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO ACCUMULATE MORE THAN A MILLIOM JB TOKEN ON BCGAME BUT WHEN I TRIED TO WITHDRAW THEM THEY REFUSED TO PAY ME.I RUM A BLUG SITE AND IF YOU REFUSE TO PAY ME MY JB TOKEN I WILL WRITE SCAM AGAINST YOU AND DAMAGE YOUR REPUTATION.STAY AWAY FROM THE SITE THEY ARE SCAMMERSMove this topic to scam accusations , that’s the right place for these kind of matters. It will be helpful to your case if you can give more information as to why the company refused to approve your withdrawal. I hope you have contacted customer support and tried to resolve the issue before coming here to accuse or threaten the casino.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: Apolinario on August 09, 2023, 10:33:36 PMBC GAME IS A SCAM SITE.I OPENED A ACCOUNT ON THE SITE AND I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO ACCUMULATE MORE THAN A MILLIOM JB TOKEN ON BCGAME BUT WHEN I TRIED TO WITHDRAW THEM THEY REFUSED TO PAY ME.I RUM A BLUG SITE AND IF YOU REFUSE TO PAY ME MY JB TOKEN I WILL WRITE SCAM AGAINST YOU AND DAMAGE YOUR REPUTATION.STAY AWAY FROM THE SITE THEY ARE SCAMMERSYou have done the right thing by reporting the issue about the casino on this forum but you need to follow the advice provided for you here so the community can see to the issue because every accusation made on this forum without a piece of evidence is seen as a troll since you're talking about one of the casinos that's doing well.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: For those of you that don’t know what Op is referring to here’s it. Image source It’s not something that a user can withdraw from the casino, it’s meant for level ups and also for those that don’t want to risk depositing their funds into the casino, to still be able to check the casino and test the games. So the Op is confused nothing more.

comments.author: Onyeeze
comments.body: Quote from: Apolinario on August 09, 2023, 10:33:36 PMBC GAME IS A SCAM SITE.I OPENED A ACCOUNT ON THE SITE AND I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO ACCUMULATE MORE THAN A MILLIOM JB TOKEN ON BCGAME BUT WHEN I TRIED TO WITHDRAW THEM THEY REFUSED TO PAY ME.I RUM A BLUG SITE AND IF YOU REFUSE TO PAY ME MY JB TOKEN I WILL WRITE SCAM AGAINST YOU AND DAMAGE YOUR REPUTATION.STAY AWAY FROM THE SITE THEY ARE SCAMMERSI think that if you want to lay your petition or accusations to them you should go scam accusations board with your reasons and evidence to proof their crime, because saying they are a scammer can be that you are one of their competitors which you are looking for way to demarket their site, make a provision of evidence it will look matured and presentable for this.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Apolinario on August 09, 2023, 10:33:36 PMBC GAME IS A SCAM SITE.I OPENED A ACCOUNT ON THE SITE AND I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO ACCUMULATE MORE THAN A MILLIOM JB TOKEN ON BCGAME BUT WHEN I TRIED TO WITHDRAW THEM THEY REFUSED TO PAY ME.I RUM A BLUG SITE AND IF YOU REFUSE TO PAY ME MY JB TOKEN I WILL WRITE SCAM AGAINST YOU AND DAMAGE YOUR REPUTATION.STAY AWAY FROM THE SITE THEY ARE SCAMMERSI know it is sad to be having such an experience with a casino but it would be nice you exercise some patience with them as to get a resolve with them. Possibly, they might be conducting a review on your account or doing anything in line with their laid down procedures to have you access to your token and come to talk of it, the volume of your withdrawal warrants them to do the needful if truly they are doing any review of such on your account. You should give them a little time and another thing is that your claims lack proof and evidence to validate. Lastly, I think this is the wrong board for this post as Nwada001 has already directed you, you can move this thread there for other necessary actions to be taken if truly you want the desired attention you are seek for.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on August 09, 2023, 11:39:49 PMFor those of you that don’t know what Op is referring to here’s it. It’s not something that a user can withdraw from the casino, it’s meant for level ups and also for those that don’t want to risk depositing their funds into the casino, to still be able to check the casino and test the games. So the Op is confused nothing more.You just cleared the air, as I was also as lost as the OP. What someone does not know is actually bigger than the person. Which means these tokens can just be considered testnet tokens as they have no real users aside from the BG game platform, and no value can be added to them.And users using the BG token could also be considered to be on a DEMO account as it's specifically set out for testing for the platform and nothing more attached to real other than having an experience on how things works.

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: This one is a scam accusation which belongs to Scam accusation board. Scam accusations.Click on Move topic at bottom and choose that board to move your topic to.Note that as a scam accusation topic, you must provide enough information like website link, proof of its scam, at least in your case. Without a specific website link, nobody knows what is the scam site you are referring to. If they search, they will find phishing sites which are different than an actual scam case.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on August 09, 2023, 11:39:49 PMFor those of you that don’t know what Op is referring to here’s it. Image source It’s not something that a user can withdraw from the casino, it’s meant for level ups and also for those that don’t want to risk depositing their funds into the casino, to still be able to check the casino and test the games. So the Op is confused nothing more.You just cleared it perfectly. And that's why new users sometime make false accusations on a reputated platform because of little knowledge or lack of DYOR.As already mentioned that this token currently doesn't contain any value and in future this may be converted to the rewards. So I think @Apolinario you should withdraw your accusation and don't make this thread longer because new replies will be worthless. So you just lock this thread to avoid spamming and edit your title with [Solved] . And think twice before you make an accusation and always provide proper detailed information in your thread to verify by us or to support you.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: looks like JB token cannot be withdrawn from the site according to Cantsay and the only purpose for it is to use it to test games, level up your account, etc... you have no case here and you will just be wasting your time if you continue to complain about not being able to withdraw JB tokens.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: JB is a fun token. You can only save your withdraw fees with that.

That is why one needs to do their own research before coming here to complain or raise a scam accusations against anybody or organisation.From the whole scenario now I think OP is doing this just to get at the casino even though they have lots of accusations and pending cases to handle which is awful and I believe OP has seen this now and would know what to do rather than chasing shadows.
